attributes.action: Turn the United Kingdom into a Secular State
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All Religions should be banned from practicing in the UK. Any place of worship should be knocked down with immediate effect, all religious holidays should automatically become bank holidays. Anyone found practicing any religion in public or behind closed doors should be given the choice deportation or public execution. Also any Public offical who's spouse/ Partner openly practices any religion should resign as they would have been already infected with this religious illness.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
